data.eml:eml: A contribution to Dongodytes (s. str.) Deuve, 1993 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Pingjing, Huang, Sunbin, Tian, Mingyi (2018): A contribution to Dongodytes (s. str.) Deuve, 1993 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechinae). ZooKeys 772: 129-140, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.772.25803, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.772.25803
